text: Generates an initial heightfield volume for use with terrain tools.
This node generates two 2D volume primitives,
, with a given resolution and initial value, to be modified by other terrain nodes.
volume is a 2D grid of values representing the distance of the terrain at each point on the map from the ground plane (the values can be negative).

volume can be used as the "mask" input to other terrain tools. It specifies which areas the terrain node’s effect should apply to: where the mask has a value of 0, the node has no effect, and where the mask has a value of 1, the node has full effect. Terrain nodes let you paint masks or generate them from information about the terrain (for example, where shadows fall, or areas below a certain height).
